amendment.description: Amendment requires Federal agencies to comply with the requirements in public law and an Executive Order that deal with instituting energy efficiency improvements in Federal buildings.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds from being available in contravention of the Federal buildings performance and reporting requirements of Executive Order 13123, the National Energy Conservation Policy Act, and the Energy Policy Act of 2005.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gordon amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A020) offered by Mr. Gordon.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gordon amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.
